text:
Hello I have a big issue with a website
When I crawl the blog with Screaming Frog the meta title contains a HubSpot additionnal code that is not present on source code

<span id=“hs_cos_wrapper_name” class=“hs_cos_wrapper hs_cos_wrapper_meta_field hs_cos_wrapper_type_text” style=“” data-hs-cos-general-type=“meta_field” data-hs-cos-type=“text” >TITLE</span>

Does someone already seen this pb ?
I believe that it’s the *content.name* property used in <title>
Is it a HubSpot bug ?
<@U2H3TT8F2> I know you’re aware of SEO pb on HubSpot CMS ? do you have an idea ?
<@U3TR96G84> you want to use page_meta.name instead. Content.name includes a wrapper
yes I don’t use anything. it’s just HubSpot that put content.name in <title> meta but I don’t know why
Somewhere there is a coded blog template, see if you can find that
I’m away from my computer at the moment

in the coded blog template I can find that
<title>{{ page_meta.html_title }}</title>
but I don’t understand why in my Drag and Drop template blog HubSpot is using <title>{{ content.name }}</title>
Can you send a screenshot?
Screaming Frog Crawl
The same when you crawl any blog post from <http://guest-suite.com/blog|guest-suite.com/blog>
You can also tr with <http://tools.buzzstream.com/meta-tag-extractor>
Let me look into this for you, that doesnt seem like that should be what is pulled.
don’t hesitate if you need more information
I’m on it until this morning (europe) and it makes me crazy
hey <@U3TR96G84> can you submit a ticket to support on this as well? Then just let me know what the ticket number is that you get back.

Does anyone know if there are any smtp/mail backlogs in HubSpot? We are submitting forms on our site and are only getting approx 10% of the emails. The forms are submitting and showing data inside our portal, but the email confirmation for the contact owner and the email addresses in the form confirmation settings are not going through.
I should add to my question.... I did add multiple emails to the confirmation email (different domains to avoid spam, etc concerns) and different emails as the form submitter/contact.
None of that changed the fact emails aren't sending reliably.

Hey guys, not sure the best place to post this, but the title of the blog posts on my listing page is not showing up.

Here is the HubL code for the listing template. Could someone please tell me if they even see the area that is supposed to pull the blog title, and if not where I have to paste it in?
Replace “<h1 class=“title”>{{ content.widgets.custom_post_title.body.value }}</h1>” with “<h1 class=“title”>{{ content.name }}</h1>”
or {{ page_meta.name }}
<@USXQZ0V3K>

Is there a #BUG channel I’m missing here on slack??

I’ve come across a new bug with the updated CMS where custom global modules aren’t “printing” whats set in the filed type. You have to go into it, change the field type in some way, then put it back to what it was (ie. font size was 16. adjust it to 17 then back to 16) and hit publish before it sets.

What’s the best channel to put this in?
youre the man
thanks!

Is there a negative to removing any of the system domains for the admin area? A client would like to remove the hs-sites domains from the options for editors so they don't get confused. I know this removes the ability to create content on a URL that isn't production, but I think they're okay with that. Just curious if there's a downside functionality wise, etc.
cc <@U7SR2GG9K> I don’t believe we have a current way to prevent an hs-sites domain from being used for content
nop, we do not
if i enable system domains and disconnect them, does that pose any negative side effects?
and a portal should have at least one internal domain
nop
it should work
but let’s leave at least one system domain in the portal please
that's fair, but it would really clean it up as we add more domains, etc moving forward.
thanks for the quick response!
np, I will discuss this with the team

Thanks. Ideally i'd love to see another option in the domain edit besides connect that is like "disabled" or "hide" to keep the domain on the account, but remove from the domain drop down options, etc... but that's a wish list. :slightly_smiling_face:
<@UBLH6MN2Z> Do you have access to support?  They can look up what’s happening to those notification emails
yep, opened a ticket. Got a few questions from them on the url with the form and the email addresses. No progress yet on exactly whats up though.
Ok, if that stalls out, please let me know the ticket number and I’ll see if I can add anything to it
3067129 if you'd like to follow or add anything. Client went live with the domain today and that appears to be the only thing not working properly.

Another question! Is there a certain line of code I would use so that if I am on the listing page, it would show the name of the blog, but when you go to a specific category (like a tag page) it would show that specific tag/category as the title?
Thanks
anyone pls and thank you
This is one way of doing it and there might be a better way but this worked for me at the time:
At the top of the page add:
and then where you want to show either the title or the tag you can use `{% if topic %}` or if “whatever” to check and show different content
<@USXQZ0V3K> for example
Is there a place to see which betas I am involved in?
oh damn i just saw this ill try it out now
so i would add that to the top of the page in which area?
inside of the blog listing template (the code side)
so the first code would just get pasted, the way it is, to the very first line of the listing template hubl area. and then where would the second one go and what do i need to add to it?
sorry you know 30x more than i do youre savin my day here lol
<@USXQZ0V3K> it’s a tiny bit tricky. You would add the content you want based on those different scenarios you mentioned in between the {% if whatever %} code
blog title in one area, tag in another
```{% if isTopicPage %} show stuff for topics {% endif %}```

or
```{% if isTopicPage %} show title for topics or whatever {% else %} show blog title or whatever {% endif %}```
your setting variables that define what kind of page it is, if they are true they show the content inside, if not, they show the other content
i am such a newbie at this haha, i get how it works (somewhat), but im still not sure exactly what i have to put in on my own and what needs to stay there in order for it to work
also im still not exactly sure where to paste them
i apologize lol
OKAY so i got it to display, but when i paste it in the hubl code it still shows the regular header too because its in a different block in the design editor
holy shit i got it to work
thank you
Awesome! you’re welcome
Be sure to test it in Litmus and remember dark modes and accessibility!
Is there some way we can make this more transparent to developers cc <@U6W3H6YN8>?
